title: A Christmas Carol
summary: The story follows Ebenezer Scrooge, an unkind and stingy man, who is visited by three ghosts: one from his past (revealing how he used to be kind), another from the present (showing him his current mistreatment of others), and a third from the future (predicting the consequences of his actions). This visitation changes Scrooge's perspective on life and humanity, leading to transformation.

character_list.name: Ebenezer Scrooge
character_list.desc: A grasping, covetous old man who becomes transformed by the three ghosts.

character_list.name: Bob Cratchit
character_list.desc: Scrooge's clerk and a father figure to his nephew Fred.

character_list.name: Tim Cratchit ("Tiny Tim")
character_list.desc: The youngest son of Bob Cratchit who is a cripple.

character_list.name: Mr. Fezziwig
character_list.desc: A kind-hearted and jovial old merchant with his own ghostly visitor to the story.

character_list.name: Fred, Scrooge's nephew
character_list.desc: Scrooge’s warmhearted and charitable nephew who visits him during Christmas Eve.

character_list.name: Ghost of Christmas Past
character_list.desc: A phantom showing things past, including Scrooge as a younger man.

character_list.name: Ghost of Christmas Present
character_list.desc: An apparition with kind, generous, and hearty nature, showing the current mistreatment of others by Scrooge.

character_list.name: Ghost of Christmas Yet to Come
character_list.desc: An apparition predicting future events that will happen if Scrooge doesn't change his ways.

character_list.name: Jacob Marley's Ghost
character_list.desc: A spectre from Scrooge's former partner in business, Jacob Marley.
